name: Nanseitale Beta
description:
This is a mixup of Nansei and Undertale.

This was done end of 2016 I think ? There was a video about it on youtube but it was removed recently due to potential copyright issues.

This one script features only one fight, with two routes (Genocide and Pacifist).

The Kaeru art and the music were made by LENK64 (https://www.youtube.com/user/LENK64)

Most other assets are borrowed from Undertale which I hope is fare use seeing we have lots of other scripts like this one.

This is unfinished, and I do not actually plan to finish it.
